title: 我的MC无法启动啊！！！
author: Maxluoke
txt_content:

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mine新时代xs 于 2019-5-14 15:07 编辑 
Maxluoke 发表于 2019-5-14 15:01
我的HMCL还会特别卡，就打开以后移动一下鼠标都会未响应
我突然注意到你的OpenGL也就是显卡驱动不兼容1.14
 at com.mojang.blaze3d.platform.GLX.glGenFramebuffers(SourceFile:854)Using framebuffer objects because Shaders are not available because OpenGL 2.1 is not supported, ARB_shader_objects is not supported, ARB_vertex_shader is not supported, and ARB_fragment_shader is not supported.
你还是试着更新显卡驱动吧，不过要小心点，别把电脑弄坏了
毕竟OpenGL1.3旧的要命，恐怕你的显卡质量也不好吧

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content: 提示: 该帖被管理员或版主屏蔽

replies.author: TenmaW
replies.txt_content: 文件丢失或者是某某冲突了吧

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
把HMCL更新到最新开发版再试一次
并重新下载一次1.14
